update voucher_record_config set voucher_code = #{voucherCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, config_type = #{configType,jdbcType=BIT}, debit_subject = #{debitSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, debit_account = #{debitAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_subject = #{creditSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_account = #{creditAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, able_flag = #{ableFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:

from voucher_record_config where VOUCHER_CODE = #{voucherCode} and CHANNEL_CODE = #{channelCode} limit 1;
